import logo from './pngs/logo.png'; import './App.css'; import Data from './data'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { let [d, setD] = useState(Data); return (

LEASE STATUS

LEASE START: 17/SEPT/2021

LEASE END: 16/SEPT/2022

DEPOSIT AMOUNT: ₩100,000,000

MONTHLY RATE: ₩8,000,000

TAX: VAT 10%

PAYMENT TERMS: UP-FRONT

DUE DATE: EVERY 17TH

{d.lessee.englishName}

{d.lessee.companyName}

{d.lessee.koreanName}

{d.lessee.address}

{d.lessee.unitNumber} {d.lessee.postalCode}

{d.lessee.companyID}

DATE DESCRIPTION AMOUNT(+VAT) PAYMENTS METHOD BALANCE DUE
09-17-2021 LEASE CHARGE ₩3,300,000 ₩3,300,000
10-16-2021 PAYMENT MADE ₩1,000,000 CASH
10-18-2021 PAYMENT MADE ₩1,000,000 WIRE
01-01-2022 DEDUCT FROM DEPOSIT ₩1,000,000 DEPOSIT
01-01-2022 DAMAGE CHARGE ₩10,000,000 ₩10,300,000

DEPOSIT BAL.

{d.lessor.address} {d.lessor.unitNumber} {d.lessor.postalCode}

{d.lessor.companyID}

); } export default App;
